about_the_game:
BlockQuake: Structural Engineering Sim, No Microtransactions

In BlockQuake, step into the role of a structural engineer managing your own office. Accept contracts from clients, design and construct buildings, and decorate your workspace as you see fit. After each project, you'll receive reviews on Zelp, hilarious emails, and unlock new upgrades through your in-game work computer to help refine your building skills.

Upgrades are available to streamline the construction process, boosting both efficiency and precision. But the real challenge? Keeping the special block intact within the structure to successfully complete each contract. If it falls, so does the project—so build smart!

With a distinct cel-shaded, cartoon style and built in Unreal Engine 5, BlockQuake combines creativity, management, and engineering in a zero-microtransaction experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: BlockQuake is a physics based block stacking game. The main concept is to build a structure that can withstand the earthquake you trigger in your lab. Make sure to keep the special block in the building to keep your clients happy!
